important to rinse quinoa very very well
like 3 changes of water that helps take
away any of the bitter compound that's
still found on the seat remember quinoa
is a seed and though we call it a whole

heat then 1/2 a teaspoon of vanilla
extract and a quarter teaspoon of ground
cardamom cardamom really adds a nice
flavor here if you don't have cardamon
you can also use cinnamon a little bit
of freshly grated nutmeg just one of the
warming spices and about 1/4 teaspoon of
coarse salt just hit a big pinch there
give it a little swirl bring this to a

reduce it to a simmer quite low cover it
and let it cook until the quinoa is nice
and tender about 16 minutes let's check

we'll just fluff it here with a fork

we have toasted sliced almonds on deck
